languages.text: "Я вижу ваше изумление... да, вы правильно все поняли. Власть Леди Теодоры действительно превосходит власть тех, кому вы подчинялись ранее. Могущество Лорд-капитана настолько велико, что ей под силу совершить невероятное — изменить судьбу слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Вашу судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "Я вижу ваше изумление... да, вы правильно все поняли. Власть Леди Теодоры действительно превосходит власть тех, кому вы подчинялись ранее. Могущество Лорд-капитана настолько велико, что ей под силу совершить невероятное — изменить судьбу слуги Империума. Вашу судьбу".

languages.text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."
languages.original_text: "Я вижу ваше изумление... да, вы правильно все поняли. Власть Леди Теодоры действительно превосходит власть тех, кому вы подчинялись ранее. Могущество Лорд-капитана настолько велико, что ей под силу совершить невероятное — изменить судьбу слуги {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Вашу судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

"I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

"I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

"I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

"I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

languages.text: “看得出来您很震惊。是的，您理解得没错，西奥多拉夫人的权力确实足以撤销您之前服侍的那些人的权力。领主舰长拥有着无可估量的权力，足以完成令人难以想象的壮举。例如，它可以彻底改变{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}某位仆人的命运，也就是，您的命运。”
languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

traits.locale_text: “看得出来您很震惊。是的，您理解得没错，西奥多拉夫人的权力确实足以撤销您之前服侍的那些人的权力。领主舰长拥有着无可估量的权力，足以完成令人难以想象的壮举。例如，它可以彻底改变{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}某位仆人的命运，也就是，您的命运。”

languages.text: «Veo su sorpresa. Sí, lo ha entendido bien: la autoridad de lady Theodora supera a la de todos a quienes haya servido hasta ahora. El poder de la Lord Capitán es tal que puede realizar proezas inimaginables, como cambiar el destino de cualquier sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Y ha elegido el suyo».
languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

traits.locale_text: Veo su sorpresa. Sí, lo ha entendido bien: la autoridad de lady Theodora supera a la de todos a quienes haya servido hasta ahora. El poder de la Lord Capitán es tal que puede realizar proezas inimaginables, como cambiar el destino de cualquier sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Y ha elegido el suyo».

languages.text: 「ショックを受けているようですね。ええ、あなたは正しく理解しています。シオドーラ様の権威は確かに、あなたが以前従った方たちの権威に取って代わるものです。ロード・キャプテンの力は非常に偉大で、殿下は考えられない偉業を成し遂げることができます。例えば、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべ、つまり、あなたの運命を変えることです」
languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

traits.locale_text: 「ショックを受けているようですね。ええ、あなたは正しく理解しています。レディ・テオドラの権威は確かに、あなたが以前従った方たちの権威に取って代わるものです。ロード・キャプテンの力は非常に偉大で、殿下は考えられない偉業を成し遂げることができます。例えば、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべの運命を変えることです。つまり、あなたの運命です」
「ショックを受けているようですね。ええ、あなたは正しく理解しています。シオドーラ様の権威は確かに、あなたが以前従った方たちの権威に取って代わるものです。ロード・キャプテンの力は非常に偉大で、殿下は考えられない偉業を成し遂げることができます。例えば、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべ、つまり、あなたの運命を変えることです」

languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the Imperium. Your fate."

languages.text: « Je vois que vous êtes sous le choc. Oui, vous avez parfaitement compris. L'autorité de dame Théodora prévaut en effet sur celle des personnes à qui vous obéissiez jusqu'ici. Le pouvoir de la seigneure-capitaine est tel qu'elle est capable d'accomplir l'impensable, comme changer le sort d'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Votre sort. »
languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous êtes sous le choc. Oui, vous avez parfaitement compris. L'autorité de dame Théodora prévaut en effet sur celle des personnes à qui vous obéissiez jusqu'ici. Le pouvoir de la seigneure-capitaine est tel qu'elle est capable d'accomplir l'impensable, comme changer le sort d'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Votre sort. »

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, schockiert Euch das. Ja, Ihr habt richtig verstanden. Lady Theodoras Autorität übersteigt die aller anderen, denen Ihr bisher dientet. Die Macht des Lord Captain ist so umfassend, dass sie unvorstellbare Dinge vollbringen kann, wie etwa das Schicksal {mf|eines Dieners|einer Dienerin} des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu verändern. Euer Schicksal."
languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, schockiert Euch das. Ja, Ihr habt richtig verstanden. Lady Theodoras Autorität übersteigt die aller anderen, denen Ihr bisher dientet. Die Macht des Lord Captain ist so umfassend, dass sie unvorstellbare Dinge vollbringen kann, wie etwa das Schicksal {mf|eines Dieners|einer Dienerin} des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu verändern. Euer Schicksal."

languages.text: "Bakıyorum da şaşırdınız. Evet, doğru anladınız. Leydi Theodora'nın yetkisi evvelinde itaat ettiğiniz kişilerin mevkilerini katbekat aşar. Lord Kaptan'ın gücü öylesine büyüktür ki {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} bir hizmetkârının kaderini değiştirmek gibi akla hayale sığmaz şeyler yapabilir. Sizin kaderinizi yani."
languages.original_text: "I see that you are shocked. Yes, you understood correctly. Lady Theodora's authority indeed supersedes that of those whom you obeyed before. The Lord Captain's power is so great that she is capable of performing unthinkable feats, such as changing the fate of a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Your fate."

traits.locale_text: "Bakıyorum da şaşırdınız. Evet, doğru anladınız. Leydi Theodora'nın yetkisi evvelinde itaat ettiğiniz kişilerin makamlarını katbekat aşar. Lord Kaptan'ın gücü öylesine büyüktür ki {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un bir hizmetkârının kaderini değiştirmek gibi akla hayale sığmaz şeyler yapabilir. Sizin kaderinizi yani."
